item.description:
Fusing the sounds of Weimar cabaret and country-western music, The Blue Flower takes us on a journey from Belle Epoque Paris to the World War I battlefields. As the artist Max Baumann assembles his memories into a spectacular collage, he reveals the story of four friends and lovers trying to make their way through a world in pieces.

The American Repertory Theatre in Cambridge has gotten better and better, and I ended up getting season tickets because everything they are doing this year looks fantastic. PLEASE NOTE: I already have my ticket, since I have season tickets, so we won't be able to sit together as a group (unless you decide to buy tickets together), I just wanted to see if people wanted to join me. There is no group rate. YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR BUYING YOUR OWN TICKET IN ADVANCE, RSVP-ing here does not guarantee attendance! Tickets are on sale starting 11/2. On the day of the show, I will be in the lobby by 1:30 pm. Showtime is 2 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and plan to be in the lobby at least half an hour early.
